alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 10:34AM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total of 2 to 4 inches, sleet accumulations of around 3/4 of an inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of and southern New Hampshire and southwest Maine. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough
